long_description: The watertight Pelican 1400 case is designed to protect cameras and other sensitive equipment at depths of up to 1m under water for up to 30 minutes. Features an exclusive O-ring design that guarantees an air-tight seal. Pressure purge valve allows quick equalization after altitude or temperature changes. Includes pre-scored foam (no cutting required), locking flange and multiple latches for greater security. Made from a lightweight yet durable structural resin.
short_description: The watertight Pelican 1400 case is designed to protect cameras and other sensitive equipment at depths of up to 1m under water for up to 30 minutes.
